name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Intermediate Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing and deploying high-performance applications, particularly in cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **Go(lang)**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **gRPC**, alongside strong competencies in **MySQL**, **Redis**, and **CloudFront**. Solid understanding of algorithms and data structures essential for efficient software design.
Skilled in full-stack development with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**; hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing.
Well-versed in deploying microservices and implementing CI/CD pipelines on **AWS** and **Azure** with compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Enthusiastic team player dedicated to delivering high-quality software solutions.
